item.title: Data from: Litter removal in a tropical rain forest reduces fine root biomass and production but litter addition has few effects
item.description: Sources Summary Caveats Set up Functions import Note in file Data inconsistencies Data pre-processing Reproducibility Section: Fine root mass and production My ANOVA results reported ANOVA results Did the authors use a one way ANOVA with no random effects? Figure 1 post-hoc tests for fig 1 Fine root mass production effects of treatment on FRB and FRB production figure 2 Section: Fine root length: standing crop, production and survivorship table 1 Figure 3 post hoc tests for fig.

item.title: Data from Critical thermal limits affected differently by developmental and adult thermal fluctuations
item.description: Sources Background Reproducibility key Caveats Reproducibility Table 1 (Results of ANOVA for effects on CTmin and CTmax of ±4 and ±8°C amplitude fluctuation after developmental acclimation (Fig. 2A)) Table 2 results Table 3 results Post-publication review Sources Salachan PV, Sørensen JG (2017) Critical thermal limits affected differently by developmental and adult thermal fluctuations. Journal of Experimental Biology 220(23): 4471-4478. https://doi.org/10.1242/jeb.165308 Salachan PV, Sørensen JG (2017) Data from: Critical thermal limits affected differently by developmental and adult thermal fluctuations.

item.title: Data from The interaction between predation risk and food ration on behavior and morphology of Eurasian perch

item.title: Data from Ontogenetic thermal tolerance and performance of ectotherms at variable temperatures
item.description: Sources Background Reproducibility key Caveats Summary of Re-analysis Reproducibility Post-publication review Reproducibility Table 1 Table 2 Table 3 Figure 2 Post-publication review Use the full model to compare to Huey & Kinsolver Table of contrasts needed for interpretation Harrell Plots of full model ignoring sex Summary of my Harrell Plots and Table of contrasts Shift in UTL Red Flags Statistical misconceptions Sources Cavieres G, Bogdanovich JM, Bozinovic F (2016) Ontogenetic thermal tolerance and performance of ectotherms at variable temperatures.
